00013 /*
00014  * per-device, per-activity energy data is shared between Battery and
00015  * BatteryStats using the DeviceEntry data structure
00016  *
00017  ***************************************************************************/
00018 
00019 #ifndef DEVICEENTRY_H
00020 #define DEVICEENTRY_H
00021 
00033 class DeviceEntry
00034   {
00035   public:
00036     opp_string  name;
00037     double  draw;
00038     int   currentActivity;
00039     int   numAccts;
00040     double  *accts;
00041     simtime_t *times;
00042 
00043     DeviceEntry() {
00044       name = NULL;
00045       draw = 0.0;
00046       numAccts = 0;
00047       currentActivity = -1;
00048       accts = NULL;
00049       times = NULL;
00050     }
00051 
00052     ~DeviceEntry() {
00053       delete []  accts;
00054       delete [] times;
00055     }
00056   };
00057 
00058 #endif
